title: So I took an Illustration class this summer...
content:
This is my body of work from my first Illustration class, ever. Thought I'd share the trials and tribulations of different mediums with the community. I enjoyed the class thoughroughly and will most likely take the second iteration of the class before I graduate in June. Questions and comments will gladly be entertained.
